snippet: A grand jury will begin hearing evidence next week in the controversial case of Eric Garner, who died after New York police put him in a banned choke hold....

headline.print_headline: New York Grand Jury to Hear Evidence in Police Choke Hold Death
headline.main: New York Grand Jury to Hear Evidence in Police Choke Hold Death

lead_paragraph: A grand jury will begin hearing evidence next week in the controversial case of Eric Garner, who died after New York police put him in a banned choke hold.
